MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.RankingTrainers.FastTree (ctx, label, features, groupId, weights, numLeaves, numTrees, minDatapointsInLeafs, learningRate, advancedSettings, onFit)

Docs.param: The maximum number of leaves per decision tree.
Total number of decision trees to create in the ensemble.
The minimal number of datapoints allowed in a leaf of a regression tree, out of the subsampled data.

A delegate that is called every time the method is called on the instance created out of this. This delegate will receive the linear model that was trained. Note that this action cannot change the result in any way; it is only a way for the caller to be informed about what was learnt.
Docs.summary: FastTree . Ranks a series of inputs based on their relevance, training a decision tree ranking model through the .
Docs.returns: The Score output column indicating the predicted value.
